events.name: UOW hiC² 2022 Campus Meet Up!
events.about: Let's meet up a hack start on
events.description: UOW Campus Fest 2022, it's time to meet up.

events.name: HackTheBox (University CTF 2021) Team UOW hiC²!
events.about: Capture the Flag Competition, Join as Team hiC²
events.description: Hack The Box University CTF 2021 is HERE! Every year Hack The Box gather university students from all over the world to compete in our university CTF, which provides a hands-on learning experience for students of all skill levels! With prizes that give even more learning opportunities! UOw hiC² will be entering a team into Hack The Box’s Uni CTF. The qualifiers are on the 19th-21st of November and is open to anyone. Currently, we can only enter teams of up to 10 people, but we can likely make more teams if the demand is there To join the CTF team head over to https://ctf.hackthebox.com/teams and sign up/login and request to join the ‘hiC2’ team. You’ll have to enter your uni email to confirm your student status.

links.name: Join the hiC² Team on HTB

events.name: Q/A with Industry Professionals
events.about: Introduction to UOW hiC² and a QnA with Google, Amazon, & Vimy regarding CyberSecurity, Cryptography and It's Job Opportunity
events.description: Under supported by the Institute of Cybersecurity and Cryptography (iC²) and Uniclubs-SAF, the Hub for the Institute of Cybersecurity and Cryptography (hiC²) will organize a Webinar - Cybersecurity Career - Q&A with Industry Professionals. The primary purpose of this webinar is to have an opportunity for students to interact with experts, the people in charge of cybersecurity programs from Google, AWS, and VIMY, with different sectors from Manager, Technical, to Academia. You will listen to the stories from real people and a real career in cybersecurity.
